name: Between These Walls
description:
The game is in development for the "My First Game Jam".

You just moved to a new apartment to start a new life.  But   the more the days go by, the more strange things happen. 
You'll have to  know what happen and why  it happen.

===============================================

Hope you'll like it.
Do not hesitate to tell me what you think of it, good or bad (especially bad, it would really help me for my futur projects).

(Screenshots doesn't show the finished game, some things may/will change or add   during the development)

================================================

Controls : 

WASDMovementSHIFTSprintEInteractRIGHT CLICKZoom

Gamepad :

LEFT JOYSTICKMovementRIGHT SHOULDERSprintAInteractLEFT TRIGGERZoom
